FeatureElements.Name: New witness on a case

Steps.Name: I have a job with a case
I add a new witness to the job and this witness is not present on any job with this case
this job witness is not marked as continuation

FeatureElements.Name: Existing witness on a case

Steps.Name: I have a job with a case
I add a new witness to the job and this witness is present on any job with this case
this job witness is marked as continuation

Feature.Name: Vendor Recommendation
Feature.Description:
In order to streamline vendor management
As a user
I want to be able to get vendor recommendation based on job location, job date, required services, etc. and
be able to choose vendor manually from the prioritized list of vendors eligible for the job

FeatureElements.Name: Recommendation based on vendor region radius
FeatureElements.Description:
Note if job location is in US and has only state as specified then vendor region radius is ignored
beacuse we cannot measure distance to location precisely

Steps.Name: I have a job with location zip code as 10007
this job requires reporting services
there is a reporter Michael Catania with location zip code as 10536 and region radius as 30 miles
there is a reporter David Howard with location zip code as 07603 and region radius as 15 miles
I ask system for a list of recommended reporters for the job
I get the following recommendation(s):
I do not get the following recommendation(s):

HeaderRow: No Match Region Field Type Value

there is a videographer David Howard with <No Match Region Field Type Value> <No Match Region Field Type> additive region

FeatureElements.Name: Recommendation based on vendor schedule and availability

Steps.Name: I have a job on Wednesday next week starting from 10:30 till 15:30
this job requires reporting services
there are the following reporters:
I ask system for a list of recommended reporters for the job
I get the following recommendation(s):

DataRows: Vendors recommended for other jobs may still be recommended for new jobs
Busted vendors may be recommended for new jobs
On hold vendors may be recommended for new jobs

Steps.Name: I do not get the following recommendation(s):

DataRows: Day weekly schedule overrides global schedule
Partial availability does not cover job time
Vendor approved on another job should not be recommended

FeatureElements.Name: Recommendation based on vendor rank

Steps.Name: I have a job
this job requires videographer services
there is a videographer Michael Catania with vendor rank 3
there is a videographer David Howard with vendor rank 1
I ask system for a top recommended videographer for the job
David Howard is recommended

FeatureElements.Name: Recommendation based on backup rank

Steps.Name: I have a job
this job requires reporting services
there is a reporter Michael Catania
there is a reporter David Howard
there is a reporter Lauren Sapienza
there is a reporter Jim Cheney
Michael Catania is assigned as reporter to the job with the following backups:
Michael Catania rejects the job
David Howard is recommended
I ask system to recommend another reporter for the job
Lauren Sapienza is recommended
Lauren Sapienza rejects the job
Jim Cheney is recommended

FeatureElements.Name: Recommendation based on requested vendors

Steps.Name: I have a job
this job requires videographer services
there is a videographer David Howard
there is a videographer Michael Catania
job client requested the following vendor(s):
I ask system for a top recommended videographer for the job
David Howard is recommended
I ask system to recommend another videographer for the job
Michael Catania is recommended

FeatureElements.Name: Recommendation based on currently assigned vendor

Steps.Name: I have a job
this job requires reporting services
there is a reporter Michael Catania
there is a reporter David Howard
Michael Catania is assigned as reporter to the job
I ask system for a top recommended reporter for the job
Michael Catania is recommended
I ask system to recommend another reporter for the job
David Howard is recommended

FeatureElements.Name: Top recommended vendor should not be one of the already rejected vendors on job
FeatureElements.Description:
Note in contrast to top recommended vendor, list of recommended vendors 
should also include rejected vendors

Steps.Name: I have a job
this job requires videographer services
there is a videographer Michael Catania
there is a videographer David Howard with vendor rank 1
there is a videographer Lauren Sapienza with vendor rank 2
Michael Catania is assigned as videographer to the job
Michael Catania rejects the job
David Howard is recommended
I ask system to recommend another videographer for the job
Lauren Sapienza is recommended
I ask system for a list of recommended videographers for the job
I get the following recommendation(s):

FeatureElements.Name: Inactive/deleted vendors should not be recommended

there is a reporter David Howard

there is a videographer Michael Catania

Michael Catania is assigned as videographer to the job with the following backups:

there is a videographer Robert Masi with vendor rank 1
there is a videographer Vicki Saber
this vendor is on hold on another job
I ask system for a list of recommended videographers for the job
I get recommendations in the following order:

Feature.Name: Automatically replace vendor in jobs when marked as unavailable for some date
Feature.Description:
In order to streamline vendor management
As a user
I want vendor recommended for some jobs but then marked as unavailable for some date 
to be automatically replaced in jobs on the that date

FeatureElements.Name: User marks vendor as unavailable on some day

Steps.Name: I have a job
this job requires videographer services
videographer Cary Bigelow is recommended for the job
I mark this videographer as unavailable on the job date
Cary Bigelow is replaced on the job by another vendor
